files.help:
Supported by default.

You can move the directory to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/ncmpcpp_.

Note that the _error.log_ file will still be created at the old location. To avoid that, set `ncmcpp_directory` in your config file.

This directory is where _ncmpcpp_ stores lyrics by default, for other _mpd_ clients also use this default path. You can move it to elsewhere, say `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/lyrics`, but it works __only if you only use _ncmpcpp___.

Supposed your `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME` is set to `~/.local/share`.
Put the following to your _ncmpcpp_ configuration, usually `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/ncmpcpp/config`

```
lyrics_directory = ~/.local/share/lyrics
```
